warn.body: Please use the calendar to pick the date of arrival and departure.

wrong-input: {{message}} If you think the problem is something else, please tell us here: hiba at bibicvedeghazak dot hu
database-error: Database error. {{message}} Please contact us at hiba at bibicvendeghazak dot hu, or call us on: +36305785730

error.body: The given interval already contains a reservation. Please choose another room or interval.
The given interval must contain a minimum of one night.

reservation.success: Reservation submitted. We will get back to you shortly. You will soon be redirected to the homepage.

error.title: Required fields
error.body: {{fields}} are required, but were not filled out.

success.title: Message sent
success.body: Message ({{id}}) has been received. We will get back to you shortly. You will be soon redirected to the homepage.

feedback.no-reservation-found: Error! This reservation does not exist.
feedback.success: Feedback sent. Thanks! You will soon be redirected to the homepage.
